seo.title: Jose Espinosa // NYC Restaurant Operations Playbooks & Systems
seo.description: Battle-tested playbooks from a District Manager running 8 NYC restaurants and $18M+ in annual sales. Stop bleeding labor. Start operating like a pro.

hero.headline: Stop Bleeding
hero.subhead: You're not bad at this — you just don't have the systems yet. I've spent 17 years managing NYC restaurant floors, from barista to District Manager. Now I'm sharing the exact playbooks that run 8 locations and $18M in sales.

founders.name: Jose Daniel Espinosa
founders.title: District Manager • Le Pain Quotidien
founders.shortBio: From Bronx barista to running 8 NYC restaurants. I know what breaks and what scales.

compatible.heading: ✓ Built For You If
profiles: You're a GM drowning in daily fires with no SOPs
You're an owner watching labor costs eat your margins
You're promoting managers who've never been trained
You run 2-10 NYC locations and need real systems

incompatible.heading: ✗ Not For You If

You're outside NYC and don't deal with our labor laws
You're looking for magic fixes without implementation
You think your 'vibe' can replace documented process

products.description: Labor is the #1 killer in NYC restaurants. These templates account for minimum wage, OT rules, split shifts, and manager coverage — the stuff generic tools ignore.
products.outcome: Cut labor costs without cutting quality

products.name: GM to District Manager Career Kit
products.description: The invisible jump from store ops to multi-unit leadership. I've made it. This kit shows you exactly how to think, present, and position yourself for promotion.
products.outcome: Get promoted or get hired at the next level
includes: KPIs That Matter Above Store Level
How to Present Numbers to Ownership

products.name: Restaurant Turnaround Diagnostic
products.description: Before you hire a consultant, diagnose yourself. This structured assessment gives you a Red/Yellow/Green scorecard across the 6 areas that make or break restaurants.
products.outcome: Know exactly what's bleeding before you spend a dime

products.name: Manager Training & Onboarding System
products.description: Tired of managers quitting in month 2? This system gives you the SOPs, timelines, and checklists to onboard managers who actually stick and perform.

products.name: NYC Restaurant Investor Readiness Kit
products.description: Whether you're seeking partners or planning an exit, you need to speak investor language. This kit shows you how to present your numbers credibly.

proof.author: Restaurant Operations Leader
proof.content: Jose's labor templates saved us 6 hours per week on scheduling alone. More importantly, we stopped getting hit with OT surprises.

faq.question: Are these playbooks NYC-specific or can I use them elsewhere?
faq.answer: The labor templates are specifically built for NYC wage laws, OT rules, and split shift regulations. The GM playbooks and training systems work anywhere, but the labor math is NYC-calibrated. If you're in another city, the principles apply but you'll need to adjust the compliance pieces.

faq.question: I'm a new GM with no formal training. Will these help?
faq.answer: These playbooks were built exactly for you. Most GMs get promoted based on hustle, then left to figure it out. Every playbook is immediately executable — no theory, no fluff. You can implement the Daily Floor Execution Checklist your first morning.

faq.question: Why PDF and spreadsheets instead of software?
faq.answer: Because operators hate logging into another platform. You need tools that work in the middle of a rush, that you can print and hand to a manager, that don't require wifi. Every template is designed for real-world restaurant chaos, not demo mode.

faq.question: What makes you qualified to sell these?
faq.answer: 17 years in NYC restaurants. Started as a barista, now running 8 locations with $18M in sales. I've made every mistake, fixed every problem, and trained 35+ managers. These aren't theoretical frameworks — they're the exact systems I use today.

faq.question: Do you offer refunds?
faq.answer: If you implement a playbook and it doesn't work for your operation, email me within 30 days. I'll either help you adapt it or refund you. I don't want your money if you can't use the work.

faq.question: Can I hire you to consult directly?
faq.answer: Yes, but start with the playbooks first. Most operators solve 80% of their problems with the right systems. If you still need hands-on help, book an Operations Deep Dive and we'll build a custom plan.

faq.question: I manage multiple locations. Is there a bulk option?
faq.answer: Email me directly for multi-unit pricing. If you're running 3+ locations, I can put together a custom bundle and potentially include a strategy call to help you roll out across your portfolio.

conversion.headline: Your Floor Won't Fix Itself.
conversion.subhead: Every day without systems is another day of labor waste, manager burnout, and preventable fires. Get the playbooks that run $18M in NYC restaurants.
conversion.urgency: Same playbooks I use today at Le Pain Quotidien
